examples.example: 我一直梦想着有一天能够出国去领略不同国家的风土人情。

translate.english: I have always dreamed that one day I can go abroad to appreciate the customs and cultures of different countries.

examples.example: 我希望在不久的将来可以出国深造，提升自己的能力。

translate.english: I hope I can go abroad for further study in the near future to improve my ability.

examples.example: 我打算努力工作几年，然后攒够钱出国旅游，看看外面的世界。

translate.english: I plan to work hard for a few years, and then save enough money to travel abroad and see the outside world.
